ing: 1 (6.5 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, chopped, liquid reserved
des: "This flavorful, creamy dip is delicious with shrimp and or raw vegetables."
ins: In a medium bowl, blend reserved liquid from marinated artichoke hearts, cream cheese and prepared Dijon-style mustard. When smooth, stir in marinated artichoke hearts. Chill approximately 1 hour before serving.
